venue.name: Dialog auditorium
venue.address_1: 15th Floor Auditorium, Dialog Axiata PLC Head Office, No 475, Union Place, Colombo 2

events.description:
NOTE: Please register at http://rsvp.lk/gdgcloudsrilanka/gdg-cloud-sri-lanka-september-workshop

GDG Cloud Sri Lanka is happy to present the first meetup of the new chapter with a workshop on Google App Engine and Google Compute Engine. Workshop consists of two hands on sessions targeting people who has basic understanding on web development, web hosting, NodeJs, SSH and virtual machines.

Agenda

• Deploying apps on Google AppEngine
By Kasun Delgolla, Senior Technical Lead - Information Security, DPIT (Aunex)

• Google Compute Engine Essentials
By Malith Hatananchchige, CEO & Cofounder Revox

events.name: DevFest 2017
events.description:
REGISTER HERE: https://buff.ly/2fIQTFV

GDG DevFest 2017 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs and more!

We will be having 3 tracks this time, one with sessions on GCP, specially on GAE and GCE, and also on progressive web apps. We have a another track for machine learning, tensorflow, etc and thrid track would be on android and firebase. We will be having Googlers and GDEs this time for the sessions!

events.name: GDG Cloud Sri Lanka December Workshop

venue.name: Dialog auditorium
venue.address_1: 15th Floor Auditorium, Dialog Axiata PLC Head Office, No 475, Union Place, Colombo 2

events.description:
NOTE: Please register at http://rsvp.lk/gdgcloudsrilanka/gdg-cloud-sri-lanka-december-workshop

ML APIs by Example
By Allen Day, Developer Advocate, Google Cloud

Think your business could make use of Google's machine learning expertise when it comes to powering and improving your business applications, but you get stuck on building and training your own custom model? Google Cloud Platform (GCP) offers five APIs: Google Cloud Vision API, Cloud Speech API, Cloud Natural Language API, Cloud Translation API, and Cloud Video Intelligence API. These APIs access pre-trained machine learning models with a single API call. In this session, we share an overview of each API. Then we dive into code with a live demo.

Allen Day is a Developer Advocate for Google Cloud. He's focused on healthcare and computational biology applications of AI and BigData technologies. Allen holds a PhD in Human Genetics from the School of Medicine at UCLA.
events.how_to_find_us: Dialog Auditorium, Doctor Colvin R de Silva Mawatha, Colombo

events.name: Cloud Study Jam 2017

venue.name: Dialog auditorium
venue.address_1: 15th Floor Auditorium, Dialog Axiata PLC Head Office, No 475, Union Place, Colombo 2

events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin?

Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge.
Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed.

Agenda:
9:00am: Three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs
12:00pm: Break
12:30pm: Intro to Docker
02:00pm: Event ends

events.name: Cloud Study Jam 2019

venue.name: Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology

events.description:
Want to get started on the Google Cloud, but don't know where to begin? Join us for our Cloud Study Jam! Together we'll work through three Google Cloud Platform Essentials labs, then you will get free access to the next quest so you can finish this series of labs at home to get a Google-hosted badge for your online profile. You will be able to get hands-on experience with Docker, Kubernetes and Scientific Data Processing, which will earn you additional badges.

Join this meetup to get official Google training, a $70+ value, free of charge. Bring a laptop (PC, Mac or Chromebook) and Internet connectivity! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. The targeted crowd for this Code Jam is people who know what is Cloud Computing, the benefits of it, why and where to use it.

Agenda:

A Tour of Qwiklabs and the Google Cloud Platform
Creating a Virtual Machine
Compute Engine: Qwik Start - Windows
Getting Started with Cloud Shell & `gcloud`
Provision Services with GCP Marketplace
Creating a Persistent Disk
Hello Node Kubernetes
Stackdriver: Qwik Start
Set Up Network and HTTP Load Balancers
Introduction to Docker
Introduction to K8s

register here : http://rsvp.lk/gdgcloudsrilanka/cloudjam

events.name: Hands on Cloud Workshop
events.description: Hands on Cloud workshop for students in University of Sri Jayawardenapura

events.name: Learn Big Data and Machine Learning from a Googler

venue.name: University of Colombo School of Computing

events.description:
Are you a developer who does mostly Java, a data analyst who works in SQL, or a data scientist who works in Python / R. Since there are a variety of different abstractions now available, you can now solve machine learning problems at a pretty high-level with tools and libraries.

It’s a bit complicated when it comes to choosing which approach to take. So here’s your chance to learn from a Googler about solving the same text classification problem using Auto ML, using SQL, and using Keras on Google Cloud Platform and tradeoffs of each approach. And get some insight on how a business might choose between them.

Register on RSVP.lk
http://rsvp.lk/gdgcloudsrilanka/learn-from-a-googler

Speakers :

Valliappa Lakshmanan
Head of Data Analytics & AI Solutions
Google Cloud

Keshan Sodimana
Machine Learning Google Developer Expert
